report.title: Memory Zapper
report.author: Xdoublexlifex
report.bodytext: One afternoon at school, after showing them off to my friends, I took 4 milligrams of xanax. It was lunch time at school and I took them on a full stomach. /n /n I went back to English class and everything was starting to get a little dizzy. /n /n I went on to band class, in which we were doing nothing because the director was leaving us. I only know this because I was told, I don't remember what happened in that class at all. /n /n /n /n /n After school I somehow managed to safely drive home. It's beyond me how I didn't wreck or something. /n /n I came home and soon crashed in the recliner. I must have zonked completely out. Later when my mom was home, I staggered like a drunk man into our living room. She asked what was wrong and I drunkenly replied 'Nothin...' And went back to the recliner. /n I woke up later that evening and felt normal. My mom didn't think too much about the episode that afternoon, though both my parents remarked that my speech sounded slurred.
